summary.span: 控制 的呈现和漂浮，以及 、 和 对象的合并。

span.span: Controls rendering and rafting, and the merging of , , and objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持 与整个应用程序相关的任务，例如合并、设置和呈现器选项。 supports -related tasks for entire applications, such as merging, settings, and renderer options. 重载的 方法将 控件彼此组合在一起，并且重载的 方法撤消合并操作。The overloaded method combines controls with each other, and the overloaded method undoes a merge operation. 将 类与类结合使用， 以获取更多的控件和可定制性而不是绘制和布局样式。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over painting and layout style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示菜单项合并的所有典型方案。The following code example demonstrates all the typical scenarios of menu item merging. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示对及其 一些成员的调用。The following code example demonstrates a call to and some of its members. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的快捷键是仅通过 F12 按 F1 的函数键;带 CTRL、ALT 或 SHIFT 修饰符的函数键;或带有 CTRL、ALT 或 SHIFT 修饰符的其他键。Valid shortcut keys are the function keys F1 through F12 alone; function keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers; or other keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers. 如果单独使用，则 CTRL、ALT 或 SHIFT 键和键不是有效的快捷键。CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT keys and keys other than function keys are not valid shortcut keys if used alone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载设置时，在设计时不在设计时窗体上的控件将 从中移除 。 controls that are not on the form at design time when the settings are saved are removed from the when the settings are loaded. 若要重置设置，请注释掉 行并退出 行。To reset the settings, comment out the line and leave the line. 这不会加载任何设置，并且将保持最后一个状态。This will not load any settings and will persist the last state. 删除行中的注释时 ，将应用这些设置。When you remove the comment from the line, those settings will be applied.

returns.span: 如果合并成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the merge is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将 相同类型的对象（例如 具有其他对象的对象 、 具有其他 对象的对象等）组合在一起。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. 使用 方法可组合 不同类型的对象。Use the method to combine objects of different types. `true` 对于这两个对象，必须将属性设置为 ，并且源类型和目标类型必须相同，否则此方法将返回 `false` 。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, and the source and target types must be identical, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果 MDI 子窗体上有两个控件，则将设置 为以 `true` 使父窗体仅合并其中一个控件的内容 。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 用于 合并 MDI 父窗体上的其他子控件的内容。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form.

span.span: or is .
or refer to the same .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可组合 不同类型的对象。Use the method to combine objects of different types. 使用 方法可将 相同类型的对象（例如 具有其他对象的对象 、 具有其他 对象的对象等）组合在一起。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. `true` 对于这两个对象，都必须将属性设置为 ，否则此方法将返回 `false` 。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果 MDI 子窗体上有两个控件，则将设置 为以 `true` 使父窗体仅合并其中一个控件的内容 。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 用于 合并 MDI 父窗体上的其他子控件的内容。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例基于指定的选项合并菜单项。The following code example merges menu items based on specified choices. 此示例是类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!CAUTION] > 若要防止内存泄漏，请在应用程序被释放时禁用此事件。To prevent memory leaks, disable this event when your application is disposed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripManager1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripManager1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#603](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#603)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#603](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#603)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载设置时，在设计时不在设计时窗体上的控件将 从中移除 。 controls that are not on the form at design time when the settings are saved are removed from the when the settings are loaded. 若要重置设置，请注释掉 行并退出 行。To reset the settings, comment out the line and leave the line. 这不会加载任何设置，并且将保持最后一个状态。This will not load any settings and will persist the last state. 删除行中的注释时 ，将应用这些设置。When you remove the comment from the line, those settings will be applied.
